quizzes.title: React Fundamentals
quizzes.description: Test your knowledge of the fundamental concepts of React, including components, state, props, JSX, hooks, and rendering logic.

questions.question: In React, what is JSX?
options: A syntax extension for JavaScript that lets you write HTML-like markup

questions.question: How do you pass data to a child component?
What is a component in React?
What does ReactDOM.createRoot() do?
options: Creates the root where the app will be rendered

questions.question: What causes a component to re-render?
What is key used for in lists?
options: To help React identify list items
